name: Puzzle Frame (itch)
description:
Puzzle Frame is an easygoing game that invites you to solve sliding puzzles at your own pace.

You'll be presented with a gallery containing more than 150 meticulously selected landscape photos accompanied by 40 minutes of relaxing music by the talented Josh Woodward.

A clean interface with a couple of options will allow you to tune the puzzle's difficulty to your mood.

There's no high scores, no hidden doors, and no plot twist, just a zen place for your mind to wander.

Demo is limited to 9 images and 4 song tracks.
